original_title: The Who and Special Guests: Live at the Royal Albert Hall
overview: The Who & Special Guests: Live at the Royal Albert Hall is a concert film of The Who's concert on November 27, 2000 at the Royal Albert Hall in London to benefit the Teenage Cancer Trust. Bryan Adams, Noel Gallagher (Oasis), Kelly Jones (Stereophonics), Kennedy, Eddie Vedder (Pearl Jam) and Paul Weller joined the Who on stage for a once-in-a-lifetime performance. The concert was also released on CD as Live at the Royal Albert Hall.
tagline: Royal Albert Hall in London, England on 27 November 2000
title: The Who and Special Guests: Live at the Royal Albert Hall
